title: How Many Calories Are in Waffles?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in waffles with a full nutrition breakdown for two standard servings, including macros, tweaks, and FAQs for better meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Waffles?
assumptions: Standard frozen waffles (plain, 75 g each), toasted without added toppings; values based on average brand like Eggo.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation method. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: Two standard waffles provide about 420 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat waffles (lower carb version)
Top with 2 tbsp maple syrup per waffle

faqs.q: How many calories are in one waffle?
faqs.a: About 210 kcal for a standard 75 g frozen waffle, toasted.
Yes, one waffle has around 28 g carbs, mostly from flour.

faqs.q: How much protein in two waffles?
Do homemade waffles differ in calories from frozen?
faqs.a: Yes, homemade can vary; added oil or sugar increases calories by 20-50 kcal per waffle.

faqs.q: What makes waffles higher in sodium?
faqs.a: Ingredients like baking powder and preservatives; one waffle has about 350 mg.
